canonical_transcript: hey i am ray from myntra here to assist you shall we proceed further in hindi or english great how can i help you today i can help you with tracking your order could you please provide me the product name please give me a moment to fetch your products your crocs unisex navy blue bayaband clogs will be delivered on or before 12 july please tell me is there anything else i can help you with we currently cannot accommodate changes to the delivery time the fastest available delivery option is always chosen for your order if you have any more questions feel free to ask im really sorry but im unable to assist with cancellation requests directly you can cancel your order through the myntra app by going to the orders section and selecting the order you wish to cancel if you need further assistance feel free to ask yes you can cancel individual items within an order through the myntra app just go to the orders section select the specific item you wish to cancel and follow the cancellation process if you need help with anything else let me know im sorry but im unable to share delivery address details you can check the delivery address in the orders section of the myntra app if theres anything else you need help with we are currently unable to support changes to the delivery address once an order is placed if you have any other questions or need further assistance feel free to ask i really apologize for the inconvenience im unable to make changes to the delivery address at this time if theres anything else i can help with or if you want to speak with another agent for further assistance just let me know to initiate a return on the myntra app open the myntra app and go to the orders section then select the item you want to return tap on return choose a reason for return provide any required details and finally submit the return request if you need any more help just let me know im experiencing technical difficulties please try again later

entities.value: crocs unisex navy blue bayaband clogs
